1.details:
Build dynamic pages at /restaurants/[id] with comprehensive restaurant information including:
- Restaurant gallery with multiple images
- Detailed description, hours, contact info
- Reviews and ratings section
- Available time slots and booking calendar
- Menu preview with popular dishes
- Map integration for location
- Social sharing capabilities

2.details:
Build menu pages at /restaurants/[id]/menu with:
- Categorized menu items (appetizers, mains, desserts, drinks)
- Item images, descriptions, prices, dietary info
- Search and filter functionality
- Add to favorites feature
- Allergen information
- Special offers and daily specials

3.content: Enhanced booking system with calendar integration
3.details:
Upgrade the booking system with:
- Real-time availability calendar
- Time slot selection with visual indicators
- Table preference selection (window, outdoor, etc.)
- Group booking options for parties > 8
- Special occasion booking (birthday, anniversary)
- Deposit handling for large parties
- Booking confirmation emails/SMS

4.details:
Create user booking management with:
- View upcoming bookings
- Modify/cancel bookings with policies
- Booking history
- Re-book favorite restaurants
- Review reminders
- Loyalty points tracking for bookings
- Push notifications for booking reminders

5.details:
Build restaurant management interface:
- Table availability management
- Booking requests approval/decline
- Menu management (add/edit items)
- Restaurant profile editing
- Customer reviews management
- Analytics and booking insights
- Special offers management

6.details:
Implement additional features:
- Wait list functionality when fully booked
- Pre-order capabilities from menu
- Table check-in via QR code
- Split bill calculator
- Group ordering for large parties
- Restaurant loyalty program integration
- Social features (share photos, tag friends)
